snippet: The expected figures (Picasso, Warhol and the like) will be the focus of art shows this season, but unexpected artists will have a strong showing too.
abstract: Many well-known artists will be the focus of art shows this fall season, but a large number of lesser-known ones will have a strong showing too.
lead_paragraph: The expected figures (Picasso, Warhol and the like) will be the focus of art shows this season, but unexpected artists will have a strong showing too.

headline.seo: Art Figures Familiar and Less So in Fall Museum Shows
headline.main: Going Beyond Marquee Names on Museum Walls
headline.print_headline: Going Beyond Marquee Names On Museum Walls

keywords.value: Los Angeles County Museum of Art
keywords.name: organizations
